about.summary: Functions that solve initial value problems of a system of first-order ordinary differential equations ('ODE'), of partial differential equations ('PDE'), of differential algebraic equations ('DAE'), and of delay differential equations.  The functions provide an interface to the FORTRAN functions 'lsoda', 'lsodar', 'lsode', 'lsodes' of the 'ODEPACK' collection, to the FORTRAN functions 'dvode', 'zvode' and 'daspk' and a C-implementation of solvers of the 'Runge-Kutta' family with fixed or variable time steps.  The package contains routines designed for solving 'ODEs' resulting from 1-D, 2-D and 3-D partial differential equations ('PDE') that have been converted to 'ODEs' by numerical differencing.

name: r-desolve
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = "1.28" %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}
{% set native = 'm2w64-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-desolve
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/deSolve_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/deSolve/deSolve_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 4c55ef4cae841df91034382d277b483985af120240f87af587ff82177fdb5a49

build:
  merge_build_host: true  # [win]
  number: 1
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}              # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_c') }}        # [win]
    - {{ compiler('fortran') }}        # [not win]
    - {{ compiler('m2w64_fortran') }}  # [win]
    - {{ posix }}filesystem        # [win]
    - {{ posix }}make
    - {{ posix }}sed               # [win]
    - {{ posix }}coreutils         # [win]
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
  run:
    - r-base
    - {{ native }}gcc-libs         # [win]

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('deSolve')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('deSolve')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://desolve.r-forge.r-project.org/
  license: GPL-2
  summary: Functions that solve initial value problems of a system of first-order ordinary differential equations ('ODE'), of partial differential equations ('PDE'),
    of differential algebraic equations ('DAE'), and of delay differential equations.  The functions provide an interface to the FORTRAN functions 'lsoda', 'lsodar',
    'lsode', 'lsodes' of the 'ODEPACK' collection, to the FORTRAN functions 'dvode', 'zvode' and 'daspk' and a C-implementation of solvers of the 'Runge-Kutta' family
    with fixed or variable time steps.  The package contains routines designed for solving 'ODEs' resulting from 1-D, 2-D and 3-D partial differential equations ('PDE')
    that have been converted to 'ODEs' by numerical differencing.
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file:
    - {{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - MathiasHaudgaard
    - FrodePedersen
    - ArneKr
    - conda-forge/r

Woodrow","Setzer", role = c("aut"), email = "setzer.woodrow@epa.gov", comment = c(ORCID = "0000-0002-6709-9186")), person("odepack authors", role = "cph"))
# Author: Karline Soetaert [aut] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0003-4603-7100>), Thomas Petzoldt [aut, cre] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-4951-6468>), R. Woodrow Setzer [aut] (<https://orcid.org/0000-0002-6709-9186>), odepack authors [cph]

# Depends: R (>= 2.15.0)

# Description: Functions that solve initial value problems of a system of first-order ordinary differential equations ('ODE'), of partial differential equations ('PDE'), of differential algebraic equations ('DAE'), and of delay differential equations.  The functions provide an interface to the FORTRAN functions 'lsoda', 'lsodar', 'lsode', 'lsodes' of the 'ODEPACK' collection, to the FORTRAN functions 'dvode', 'zvode' and 'daspk' and a C-implementation of solvers of the 'Runge-Kutta' family with fixed or variable time steps.  The package contains routines designed for solving 'ODEs' resulting from 1-D, 2-D and 3-D partial differential equations ('PDE') that have been converted to 'ODEs' by numerical differencing.

put it in ~/.conda-smithy/azure.token
